channel.title: How To Delete What Hans Says?
channel.description:
How do i delete what hans says because my server is IceBlitzPkz but he says Welcome to D D S P 3 C!!! and i dont know how to delete it please answer :D ,
Thank You, A Raffo.

item.title: How To Delete What Hans Says?
item.dc:creator: @agent_nukks agent nukks
item.description:
@agent_nukks wrote:

Well if it is chat screen text, then edit it in client.java, search for what he says, and edit to you liking, if its an over head text, go into npchandler.java, edit h=what he says, and compile =)

Read full topic
item.source: How To Delete What Hans Says?

item.title: How To Delete What Hans Says?
item.dc:creator: @hig_golem hig golem
item.description:
@hig_golem wrote:

yes thats true but if you change in npc.handler you will see it on its head but if you change it in client.java cane you only talk with him when you click on hiim

Read full topic
item.source: How To Delete What Hans Says?

item.title: How To Delete What Hans Says?
item.dc:creator: @Puremaster Puremaster
item.description:
@Puremaster wrote:

[quote=“jupesku, post:2, topic:219067”]its easy go to the npc handler and search this (npcs[i].npcType == 0 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { and there is textupdate there u write what u want to hans say[/quote] huh i thought u change it at client,java

Read full topic

item.title: How To Delete What Hans Says?
item.dc:creator: @hig_golem hig golem
item.description:
@hig_golem wrote:

Go to npc handler and search for what he says and change it in whatever you want!

item.title: How To Delete What Hans Says?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

go to your npchandler.java and search his words. Then delete them and put what you want or just delete that whole bit and he won’t say anything

Read full topic

item.title: How To Delete What Hans Says?
item.dc:creator: @jupesku jupesku
item.description:
@jupesku wrote:

its easy go to the npc handler and search this (npcs[i].npcType == 0 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { and there is textupdate there u write what u want to hans say
